[++Egg/Carton Cheats++]

[Keep Egg From Nest: L+R=No, Start=Yes]
D3000000 0862DA8C
A0000000 FF0000FF
DD000000 00000300
20000001 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000008
20000001 00000001
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
{L+R will let you move faster while holding the egg, but you wont recieve the egg on exit. Start returns both the lower speed and ability to recieve the egg upon exit}

D1000000 00000000
